tool_description: Retrieves customer notification preferences including preferred channels, languages, and delivery settings.

preference_type.description: Type of preferences to fetch: all, channels, language, timing

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system
Invalid preference_type: Must be one of [all, channels, language, timing]
Preferences unavailable: Customer preferences could not be retrieved due to system error
usage: Provide customer_id and preference_type to retrieve the customer's notification preferences. Use 'all' to get complete preference profile.

customer_id.description: The customer ID that was queried

preferred_language.description: Customer's preferred language code (en, es, fr, etc.)

phone_number.description: Customer's phone number for SMS notifications
